verses.verse: <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast,<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up.

And <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> to him, were with him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H7230>so<s%> <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> they could not be <S%H5608>counted<s%> or <S%H4487>numbered.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to its <S%H4725>place,<s%> into the <S%H1687>inner<s%> <S%H1687>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>place,<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> [their] <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5526>made<s%> a <S%H5526>covering<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and its <S%H905>poles<s%> from <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>

But the <S%H905>poles<s%> were so <S%H748>long<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>poles<s%> could be <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1687>inner<s%> <S%H1687>sanctuary,<s%> but they could not be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>outside;<s%> they are <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H369>There<s%> was <S%H369>nothing<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7534>except<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5117>put<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> from the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

so that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> for the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> that He would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>cloud.<s%>
"I have <S%H1129>surely<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> Thee a <S%H2073>lofty<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> A <S%H4349>place<s%> for Thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>faced<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> while <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5975>standing.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to my father <S%H1>David<s%> and has <S%H1732>fulfilled<s%> [it] with His <S%H4390>hand,<s%> <S%H3027>saying,<s%>

<S%H4480>'Since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3318>brought<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I did not <S%H977>choose<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [in which] to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> that My <S%H8034>name<s%> might be <S%H8033>there,<s%> but I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to be <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

"Now it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of my father <S%H1>David<s%> to <S%H1732>build<s%> a <S%H1129>house<s%> for the <S%H1004>name<s%> of the <S%H8034>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H430>Israel.<s%>

"But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to my father <S%H1>David,<s%> <S%H1732>'Because<s%> <S%H3282><s%> it was in your <S%H834>heart<s%> to <S%H3824>build<s%> a <S%H1129>house<s%> for My <S%H1004>name,<s%> you <S%H8034>did<s%> <S%H2895>well<s%> that it was in your <S%H2895>heart.<s%>

<S%H7534>'Nevertheless<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> but your <S%H1121>son<s%> who shall be <S%H3318>born<s%> <S%H2504><s%> to you, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for My <S%H8034>name.<s%>'

"Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6965>fulfilled<s%> His <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke;<s%> for I have <S%H6965>risen<s%> in <S%H8478>place<s%> of my father <S%H1>David<s%> and <S%H1732>sit<s%> on the <S%H3427>throne<s%> of <S%H3678>Israel,<s%> as the <S%H3478>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>promised,<s%> and have <S%H1696>built<s%> the <S%H1129>house<s%> for the <S%H1004>name<s%> of the <S%H8034>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H430>Israel.<s%>

"And <S%H8033>there<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark,<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H3772>made<s%> with our fathers when He <S%H1>brought<s%> them from the <S%H3318>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt.<s%>"

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>beneath,<s%> <S%H8478><s%> who art <S%H8104>keeping<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and [showing] <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3820>heart,<s%>

<S%H834>who<s%> hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> with Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> my father <S%H1>David,<s%> that <S%H1732>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H834>promised<s%> him; indeed, Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with Thy <S%H1696>mouth<s%> and hast <S%H6310>fulfilled<s%> it with Thy <S%H4390>hand<s%> as it is <S%H3027>this<s%> <S%H2088>day.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> with Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my father that <S%H1>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H834>promised<s%> him, <S%H1696>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H559>lack<s%> a <S%H3772>man<s%> to <S%H376>sit<s%> on the <S%H3427>throne<s%> of <S%H3678>Israel,<s%> <S%H3478>if<s%> <S%H518>only<s%> your <S%H7534>sons<s%> <S%H1121>take<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H8104>way<s%> to <S%H1870>walk<s%> <S%H1980>before<s%> Me as you have <S%H6440>walked.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let Thy <S%H1697>word,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> Thee, be <S%H539>confirmed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> my father <S%H1>David.<s%>

"But will <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>highest<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>contain<s%> Thee, <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>less<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1129>built!<s%>

"Yet <S%H6437>have<s%> <S%H6437>regard<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and to his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prays<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee <S%H3117>today;<s%>

that Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> 'My <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8033>there,<s%>' to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"And <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> and of Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> Thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> Thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive.<s%>

<S%H834>"If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and is <S%H5377>made<s%> to <S%H422>take<s%> an <S%H423>oath,<s%> and he <S%H935>comes<s%> [and] <S%H422>takes<s%> an <S%H422>oath<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> Thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H6213>act<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> by <S%H5414>bringing<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

"When Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H5062>defeated<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> an <S%H340>enemy,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Thee, if they <S%H7725>turn<s%> to Thee <S%H7725>again<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> and <S%H2603>make<s%> <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to Thee in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> Thou in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> of Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou didst <S%H5414>give<s%> to their fathers.

"When the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H6113>shut<s%> up and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against Thee, and they <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> Thou dost <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them,

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> Thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> and of Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>indeed,<s%> <S%H3384>teach<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they should <S%H1980>walk.<s%> And <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on Thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> there is <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there is <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there is <S%H9584>blight<s%> [or] <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> [or] <S%H2625>grasshopper,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> their <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H9503>besieges<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5061>plague,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H9258>sickness<s%> there is,

<S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8605>prayer<s%> or <S%H8467>supplication<s%> is <S%H1961>made<s%> by <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> [or] by <S%H3605>all<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3045>knowing<s%> the <S%H5061>affliction<s%> of his own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H6566>spreading<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> Thou in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> Thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> and <S%H6213>act<s%> and <S%H5414>render<s%> to <S%H376>each<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> Thou <S%H3045>knowest,<s%> for Thou <S%H905>alone<s%> dost <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%>
that they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> to our fathers.

<S%H1571>"Also<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not of Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when he <S%H935>comes<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> for Thy name's <S%H4616>sake<s%>
